name: Halloween Survivor
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/helloween-survivors

The Game was made with Godot. We didnt invest that much time into the game but it was quite fun to finisch a project.

Artworkt was made mainly by smorrebrot (https://smorrebrot.itch.io/) Coding and music by me (https://soundcloud.com/beedkraft)

Hope u like this little game even if its not much :)

INSTRUCTIONS:

Move with WASD Select cards with your mouse.

Every 10 seconds you can draw a new card wich gives you different abilities (there are 3 abilities to discover)

HAVE FUN!!!!!

Downloads
